section.text: *NOTE: This section includes amendments by emergency legislation that will expire on [EXPIRATION DATE]. To view the text of this section after the expiration of all emergency and temporary legislation, click this link: Permanent Version.*
section.heading: Establishment of the Citywide Vending Task Force.

annotations.annotation: For temporary (90 day) addition, see § 10(a) of Vending Regulation Congressional Review Emergency Act of 2009 (D.C. Act 18-47, April 27, 2009, 56 DCR 3574).
For temporary (90 day) addition, see § 10(a) of Vending Regulation Emergency Act of 2009 (D.C. Act 18-9, January 29, 2009, 56 DCR 1638).
For temporary (90 day) addition, see § 10(a) of Vending Regulation Emergency Act of 2008 (D.C. Act 17-322, March 19, 2008, 55 DCR 3445).
For temporary (90 days) amendment of this section, see § 2042(d) of Fiscal Year 2026 Budget Support Emergency Act of 2025 (D.C. Act 26-146, Sept. 3, 2025, 0 DCR 0).
For temporary (90 days) creation of § 37-131.09a, see § 2042(e) of Fiscal Year 2026 Budget Support Emergency Act of 2025 (D.C. Act 26-146, Sept. 3, 2025, 0 DCR 0).
